document_data.name: Arrhenish
document_data.mainbody:
'''Arrhenish''' was a sweet [[Cormyr]]ian wine. Although it was popular in the royal court, connoisseurs thought it was swill.

{{quote|''I must do something about these Cormyreans and their execrable tastes in wine. When I sit on the Dragon Throne, those who make and sell overly sweet swill like this will be swiftly drowned in it. My subjects will share in my delight in the ner things. I won’t even style myself "king."''|[[Manshoon]] on Arrhenish wine}}
